entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 21 at 12:32PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT... AT 1229 PM CDT...NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE DOPPLER RADAR INDICATED STRONG THUNDERSTORMS ALONG A LINE EXTENDING FROM LAKE FOREST TO YORKVILLE TO PERU...MOVING EAST AT 30 MPH. HAIL UP TO ONE HALF INCH DIAMETER...WINDS 35 TO 45 MPH...CONTINUOUS CLOUD TO GROUND LIGHTNING...HEAVY DOWNPOURS WITH LOCALIZED
entry.cap:areaDesc: Cook; De Kalb; DuPage; Grundy; Kane; Kendall; La Salle; Lake; McHenry; Will
